node.title: Ash Barty announces engagement
node.alt: Ash Barty and Garry Kissick smile and hug
node.description: Australian world number one tennis player Ash Barty has announced her engagement to her partner of four years, Garry Kissick.
node.content: ["World number one tennis player Ash Barty has announced her engagement to long-term partner Garry Kissick.", "The 25-year-old shared a post on Instagram with the caption \"Future husband\" along with a picture of the pair hugging, an engagement prominently displayed on her finger.", "Kissick, 30, a former golf pro, shared two photos on his Instagram page with the date of their engagement, November 15, and the\u00a0caption, \"I love you @ashbarty\".", "The pair have been dating since 2017, with Kissick regularly posting photos of the pair at various tennis tournaments around the world.", "The announcement came off the back of a stellar year on the court for the Queenslander.", "Barty\u00a0recently joined tennis luminaries Steffi Graf, Martina Navratilova, Serena Williams and Chris Evert as the only players to finish year-end number one for three straight years.", "The Ipswich athlete won five WTA singles titles in 2021 \u2014 including a maiden Wimbledon crown \u2014\u00a0and earned a doubles bronze medal at this year's Tokyo Olympic Games with John Peers.", "Barty has not competed in over two months after being knocked out of the US Open and opting out of the WTA finals in Mexico to return home to prepare for next year's Australian Open.", "She ended the year with a remarkable 42-8 record in 2021 and has been number\u00a0one for 95 consecutive weeks.", "Fellow players and athletes were quick to congratulate the pair on social media.", "Simona Halep replied with a series of heart emojis, while Aussie Priscilla Hon wrote \"Omg!!!!!!\"", "Barty's former doubles partner, Casey Dellacqua, wrote \"Best news EVER beautiful couple\",\u00a0followed by several heart emojis.", "The WTA, Tennis Australia and the Australian Open accounts all offered their congratulations as well."]
